ETLComponent.name: UniversalDataReader
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Reads data from flat files (CSV, fixed-length).
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from delimited or fixed length files and sends data records to first connected output port. If any error occurs, the report is sent to the second port if "Data policy" is set to "Controlled".

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per source
property.name: skipSourceRows

property.displayName: Max number of records per source
property.name: numSourceRecords

ETLComponent.name: UniversalDataWriter
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Writes data to flat files (CSV, fixed-lenght).
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and writes data records to delimited or fixed length files based on input metadata.

ETLComponent.name: DelimitedDataReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from delimited files and sends data records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: DelimitedDataWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and writes data records to delimited files based on input metadata.

ETLComponent.name: SimpleCopy
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and copies data records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: Concatenate
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports in turn. Gets all records from each input port, sends them to output port and continues with the next input port. Skips ports without incoming data. Terminates when all incoming records are received and sent to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: SimpleGather
ETLComponent.description: Receives data incoming through all connected input ports in the order so that all records are gathered and send out through output port as soon as possible.

ETLComponent.name: Reformat
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Changes format, structure or content of records.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, transforms them in a user specified way, and sends such new outgoing data records to all connected output ports. Implements org.jetel.component.RecordTransform interface.

ETLComponent.name: DBInputTable
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Reads data from database using JDBC driver.
ETLComponent.description: Connects to database using JDBC driver, executes specified query on DB, extracts the rows returned by the query and sends them as data records to all connected output ports. Output metadata must precisely describe the structure of extracted rows.

ETLComponent.name: Sort
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, sorts data records according to specified sort key and sends them to all connected output ports. Sort key is name or combination of names of field(s) of incoming records. Sort order can be either Ascending (default) or Descending. This component is deprecated and should not be used anymore, we suggest you work with ExtSort instead.

ETLComponent.name: DBOutputTable
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Loads data into database using JDBC driver.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, connects to database using JDBC driver, performs database operation and loads data records into specified DB table. Correspondence between input metadata and DB table columns must be defined.

ETLComponent.name: FixLenDataWriter
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Writes data to fixed length files.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and writes data records to fixed length files based on input metadata.

ETLComponent.name: Dedup
ETLComponent.description: Receives sorted data records through connected input port and removes records that are in duplicate with a view to the specified key values. Keeps defined number of records from either the start (First) or the end (Last) of each group with the same key value. If desired, only unique records are kept. Dedup key is name or combination of names of field(s) of incoming records. Rejected records are sent to the optional second output port if connected.

ETLComponent.name: FixLenDataReader
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Reads data from fixed length files.
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from fixed length files and sends data records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: Merge
ETLComponent.description: Receives sorted data through all connected input ports in turn. Gets all incoming records and sends them to connected output port sorted in the same way. Terminates when all incoming records are received and sent to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: MergeJoin
ETLComponent.description: Receives sorted data through all connected input ports, for each join key value contained in data records incoming through the first input port (drivers) searches corresponding data records incoming through the other port(s) (slaves) with the same key value. Every combination of driver and its corresponding slaves is sent to transformation class that joins them to form outgoing data flow. Resulting records are sent to connected output port. This component is deprecated and should not be used anymore, we suggest you work with ExtMergeJoin instead.

ETLComponent.name: ExtMergeJoin
ETLComponent.description: Receives sorted data through all connected input ports, for each join key value contained in data records incoming through the first input port (drivers) searches corresponding data records incoming through the other port(s) (slaves) with the same key value. Every combination of driver and its corresponding slaves is sent to transformation class that joins them to form outgoing data flow. Resulting records are sent to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: Trash
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and discards it all. However, data can be written to specified file for debugging.

ETLComponent.name: DBExecute
ETLComponent.description: Executes specified commands (SQL/DML) on specified database table. If using stored procedure, receives records through connected input port and sends return value and/or output parameters to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: HashJoin
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, for every connected slave input port (all input ports except the first) creates hash table from data records incoming through such slave input port (for this reason, number of incoming slave data records must be sufficiently small), for each join key value contained in data records incoming through the first input port (drivers) looks up every hash table and searches corresponding slave data records with the same key value. Every tuple of driver and its corresponding slaves is sent to transformation class that joins them to form outgoing data flow. Resulting records are sent to connected output port. This component is deprecated and should not be used anymore, we suggest you work with ExtHashJoin instead.

ETLComponent.name: ExtHashJoin
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, for every connected slave input port (all input ports except the first) creates hash table from data records incoming through such slave input port (for this reason, number of incoming slave data records must be sufficiently small), for each join key value contained in data records incoming through the first input port (drivers) looks up every hash table and searches corresponding slave data records with the same key value. Every tuple of driver and its corresponding slaves is sent to transformation class that joins them to form outgoing data flow. Resulting records are sent to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: CheckForeignKey
ETLComponent.description: Checks foreign key values against a table of primary key values. Duplicate primary keys are ignored. Invalid foreign key values are replaced by default foreign key value. Resulting foreign data records are sent to all connected output ports. Invalid data records are sent to the optional second output port if connected.

singleType.name: joinKey
singleType.labels: Foreign key definition;Foreign key;Primary key;;Foreign key definition;Foreign key;Primary key;

ETLComponent.name: DBFDataReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from dBase files and sends data records to all connected output ports.

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per source
property.name: skipSourceRows

property.displayName: Max number of records per source
property.name: numSourceRecords

ETLComponent.name: DBFDataWriter
ETLComponent.description: Writes data from input port to dBase file(s). Handles Character/Number/Logical/Date dBase data types. Requires fixed-length metadata on input.

property.name: dbfType
property.defaultHint: 0x03 FoxBASE+ / Dbase III plus, no memo

item.displayValue: 0x03 FoxBASE+ / Dbase III plus, no memo
0x32 Visual FoxPro with field type Varchar or Varbinary
0x43 dBASE IV SQL table files, no memo

ETLComponent.name: ExtFilter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data records through connected input port, removes some of them depending on defined filter expression and sends the rest to the connected first output port. Rejected records are sent to the optional second output port if connected.

ETLComponent.name: ExtSort
ETLComponent.description: Receives data records through connected input port, sorts them according to specified sort key and sends them to all connected output ports. Sort key is name or combination of names of field(s) of incoming records. Sort order can be either Ascending (default) or Descending. Any number of records can be sorted. If internal buffer is full, external sorting is performed.

ETLComponent.name: SortWithinGroups
ETLComponent.description: Receives data records through connected input port, sorts them according to specified sort key within groups of data records. The groups are defined by previous sorting of the records by the group key, with each group consisting of records considered equal when sorting by the group key. Sends sorted data records to all connected output ports. Sort key (as well as group key) is name or combination of names of field(s) of incoming data records. Sort order of each data field can be either Ascending (default) or Descending. Can be different for different key fields. Any number of records can be sorted. If the internal buffer is full, external sorting is performed.

ETLComponent.name: Partition
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, splits incoming data flow into more flows and sends each of them to different connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: DataIntersection
ETLComponent.description: Receives sorted data flows through both input ports, finds data records with the same key values, converts these records to outgoing records according to defined transformation and sends these resulting records to the second output port. Data records contained only in the first or second data flow are sent to the first or third output ports, respectively.

singleType.name: joinKey
singleType.labels: Join key;Set A key;Set B key;;;Set A key field;Set B key field

ETLComponent.name: Aggregate
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, aggregates information about groups of adjacent records with the same aggregate key value, creates outgoing records from this information along with other input fields according to output metadata and sends these resulting records to all connected output ports. Can by used similarly as GROUP BY in SQL.

ETLComponent.name: SystemExecute
ETLComponent.description: Executes system commands and sends their outputs to the optional output port or writes it to output file. If command requires some data, it can be get through connected optional input port.

ETLComponent.name: RunGraph
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Runs graphs in selected instance of Clover.
ETLComponent.description: Runs specified graph(s) in selected instance of Clover. Name(s) of at least one graph can be received through connected input port or name of one graph only can be set as attribute of this component. If graph name(s) is(are) received through connected input port, information about execution of the graph(s) is sent to the connected first output port (second output port is not connected). If graph name is set as attribute of the component, input port is not connected and information about execution of the graph is sent to connected output ports. It is sent to the first output port if it is successful or to the second if not.

singlePort.label: in regular mode: names of the graphs to be executed, otherwise nothing
regular mode: status messages, pipeline mode: an information record in case of successful termination, otherwise nothing
in pipeline mode an information record in case of an error, otherwise nothing

ETLComponent.name: HTTPConnector
ETLComponent.shortDescription: HTTPConnector sends HTTP requests to a web server and receives responses.
ETLComponent.description: Receives an HTTP request through the connected input port, reads it from input file or directly from the graph and sends it to the HTTP server. Takes the response from the server and sends it out through the connected output port or writes it to the output file. Optionally also the output file URLs can be sent out through the connected output port.

singleType.name: key
singleType.title: Fields to use as multipart entities

ETLComponent.name: KeyGenerator
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, generates one new field based on other specified fields, adds this new field to outgoing data records and sends them to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: ApproximativeJoin
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through two input ports, for each matching key value contained in driver data records (port 0) searches corresponding slave data records (port 1) with the same key value. For every pair of driver and slave records conformity based on join key is computed as Levenstein distance. Pairs with conformity higher than specified value are joined to form outgoing data flow and these resulting records are sent to the first output port. Pairs with conformity less are joined to form outgoing data flow and these resulting records sent to the second output port. Driver records without slave are sent to the third output port if connected. Slave records without driver are sent to the fourth output port if connected.

ETLComponent.name: DBJoin
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Joins incoming data flow with records from database table.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port (drivers), connects to database, for each join key value contained in driver data records searches corresponding data records with the same key value in database table (slaves). Every pair of driver and slave records is sent to transformation class that joins them to form outgoing data flow. Resulting data records are sent to the first output port. Driver records without slave are sent to the second output port if connected and if inner join (default) is performed.

ETLComponent.name: XLSDataReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads specified sheets of Excel files, converts their contents to data records and sends them to all connected output ports. Mapping of sheet columns to output metadata must be defined.

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per source
property.name: skipSourceRows

property.displayName: Max number of records per source
property.name: numSourceRecords

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per spreadsheet
property.name: skipSheetRows

property.displayName: Max number of records per spreadsheet
property.name: numSheetRecords

ETLComponent.name: XLSDataWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and writes data records to specified sheets of Excel files.

ETLComponent.name: CloverDataWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and writes data records to output files in internal binary Clover data format.

ETLComponent.name: CloverDataReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from files written in internal binary Clover data format and sends data records to all connected output ports.

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per source
property.name: skipSourceRows

property.displayName: Max number of records per source
property.name: numSourceRecords

ETLComponent.name: StructuredDataWriter
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Writes data to files in structured way.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port(s) and writes data records to output files according to defined structure consisting of header, body and footer. Header and footer are optional.

ETLComponent.name: Normalizer
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, splits each data record into more records and sends all resulting records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: Denormalizer
ETLComponent.description: Denormalizes input records - ie composes one output record from several input records using user-specified transformation. One group is defined with the same value on the given field(s) or has the fixed size. The transformation is supposed to implement interface RecordDenormalize. Sends all resulting records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: Rollup
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, groups incoming records by their key values and lets user transformation arbitrarily create new data records from the group by aggregating, composing or splitting. Sends these new data records through the connected output port(s) as specified by the transformation. Rollup function is superset for (De)Normalizer components.

ETLComponent.name: JMSReader
ETLComponent.description: Receives JMS messages, converts them to data records and sends them to all connected output ports. Implements JmsMsg2DataRecord interface.

ETLComponent.name: JMSWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, converts data records to JMS messages and sends them out. Implements DataRecord2JmsMsg interface.

ETLComponent.name: LookupJoin
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Joins incoming data flow with records from lookup table.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port (drivers), for each join key value contained in driver data records searches corresponding data records with the same key value in lookup table (slaves). Every pair of driver and slave records is sent to transformation class that joins them to form outgoing data flow. Resulting data records are sent to the first output port. Driver records without slave are sent to the second output port if connected and if inner join (default) is performed.

ETLComponent.name: LookupTableReaderWriter
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Reads data from lookup table or write data to lookup table.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data records through connected input port and writes them to specified lookup table (output port is not connected) or reads data records from lookup table and sends them out through all connected output ports (input port is not connected). Lookup table can also be updated before data records are read and sent out (both input port and output ports are connected).

ETLComponent.name: DataGenerator
ETLComponent.description: Generates data records according to defined pattern and sends them to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: SequenceChecker
ETLComponent.description: Checks the sort order of incoming data records. If all records are sorted properly for a specified sort key, the component continues, otherwise it fails (thus aborting the graph). Sort key is name or combination of names of field(s) of incoming records. Sort order is either Ascending (default) or Descending, but it is always the same for all key fields. If the sort order is correct, the incoming records are sent out through output port(s) if connected.

ETLComponent.name: XMLXPathReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from XML files, converts elements matched by XPath defined in mapping along with their direct children to data records and sends them into different connected output ports as defined by mapping.

ETLComponent.name: XMLExtract
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from XML files, converts elements matched by mapping along with their children to data records and sends them to different connected output ports as defined by mapping.

property.displayName: Max number of rows to output
property.name: numRecords

ETLComponent.name: JSONExtract
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from JSON files, converts elements matched by mapping along with their children to data records and sends them to different connected output ports as defined by mapping.

property.displayName: Max number of rows to output
property.name: numRecords

ETLComponent.name: XMLReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from XML, converts properties matched by XPath defined in mapping along with their direct children to data records and sends them into different connected output ports as defined by mapping.

ETLComponent.name: SpeedLimiter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, delays each incoming data record by defined value of milliseconds and copies all data records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: Sleep
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, delays each incoming data record by defined value of milliseconds and copies all data records to all connected output ports.

ETLComponent.name: JavaExecute
ETLComponent.description: Executes Java commands using runnable transformation.

ETLComponent.name: XMLWriter (deprecated)
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, converts data records to XML elements based on defined mapping and writes the resulting tree structure of elements to XML files.

property.displayName: Mapping of ports to XML structure
property.name: mapping

property.displayName: Name of root element in output XML file
property.name: rootElement

ETLComponent.name: XMLWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, converts data records to XML elements based on defined mapping and writes the resulting tree structure of elements to XML files.

ETLComponent.name: XSLTransformer
ETLComponent.description: Changes / tranforms data record between one INPUT and one OUTPUT port.
